Room.Name: Foothills Trail/Garden Path Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Foothills Trail east of the community of Nyyron.
Room.LongDescription: The Enchanted Forest is on the west side of the trail, and steep foothills are on the east. There are some strange looking plants and vines on the west side which seem to creep and move even as you watch. Looks like there is a small path cutting over to the west, through that wild vegetation.
